meanings.definition: Tired or fatigued, especially in the eyes.
meanings.sent1: After a long day of playing outside, the children's eyes looked bleariest.
meanings.sent2: The bleariest students in class were struggling to keep their eyes open during the lecture.
meanings.sent3: The bleariest puppy yawned and rubbed its eyes sleepily.
meanings.sent4: Her bleariest gaze betrayed her exhaustion after the sleepless night.
meanings.sent5: The bleariest look on his face indicated he needed a good night's rest.

meanings.sent1: The bleariest view through the foggy window made it hard to see outside.
meanings.sent2: His bleariest eyes struggled to focus on the small print of the book.
meanings.sent3: The bleariest glasses needed a good cleaning to clear up the smudges.
meanings.sent4: The bleariest camera lens distorted the once clear image.
meanings.sent5: The bleariest vision after swimming in the pool without goggles was a lesson learned.
